ingredients: 1 cup water,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 5  dried pitted prunes, chopped, 1 teaspoon sugar substitute (such as Splenda),   +   1/4 cup oat bran
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 2%, Sodium 10mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 7g 25%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 1mg 7%, Calcium 48mg 4%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 451mg 10%
